entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of freezing drizzle. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle or light snow. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 5 with temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming north 30 km/h near noon. High minus 5 with temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
